import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"jira-usage-and-best-practises"}}>{`JIRA Usage and Best Practises`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is a set of personally decided best guidelines for when structuring a project.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"guidelines"}}>{`Guidelines`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Guideline`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Desc`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Tasks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Keep tasks as high level as possible. Make sure, however, that these high-level tasks are specific enough to target one area.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Subtasks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`These should break down the high level task into manageable pieces.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Time estimate`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`It is really important to give a time estimate beside each unit. These estimates will be used in future to help decide the best use of time.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Time logging`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Log actual time against the estimate for future reference. Be as accurate as possible.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Priority`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`If possible, ensure to give an accurate priority to the high level tasks. This will help with defining daily schedules and sprints.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Versions`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`When going through iteration cycles, try as hard as possible to define the version these tasks belong too.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Components`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`For each section of a project, set a component.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Labels`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Labels are more informal but arguably more important to defining where time allocation has gone. These labels should not change from project to project.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"component-vs-label"}}>{`Component vs Label`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Definition of a component and a label:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Components are sub-sections of a project. They are used to group issues within a project into smaller parts. Labeling allows you to categorize an issue(s) in a more informal way than assigning it to a version or component. You can then search for issues that have been given a particular label.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"sprints"}}>{`Sprints`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Ensure that each sprint takes into account the appropriate amount of work hours. This means taking into account the hours required for meetings, retrospectives etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Treat each work week as a total of 40 hours per person.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`While things can change, try not to change the scope of the sprint after it has started. The only addition tasks (if possible) to be added should be subtasks. `}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
